subject: Re: FW: Flock for Businesses
body:
You don't often get email from randy.zobel@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hey Derek,  

I will reach out to him now. Thank you for sending over his contact information. 

Thank you, 
 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/219730f8-b03a-4419-bc85-54dac1d0f6a3.gif> 

On Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 2:08?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Randy,

	 

	I met today with representatives from Oregon Community Credit Union.  Their Law Enforcement Investigator liaison is Mike Rustik who is a retired Detective with our department.  They have an interest in Flock.  I CC�d Mike on this email and he can help set up some introductions if you want to respond directly to him and provide your information and contact information.

	 

	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192



-- 

	
Randy Zobel
Flywheel Account Executive I



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/200-vs-400-feet-dfr?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=CommercialSales&utm_medium=Wisestamp
